title: Halo Duology PC *Fixed*
description:
SEED WHEN DONE

Just put the duology folder where ever you want it to be.

To Play halo 1 just run the halo.exe
To Play halo 2 Run the h2online.exe and sign up by clicking the top left halo sign then sign in with those credentials then start playing


Remove spaces

DESCRIPTION:

The game's plot tells the story of the war people (UNSC) and the union of several alien races (Covenant). People struggle fight for survival, but still losing out on all fronts. Last hope in these circumstances is the project SPARTAN-II - program to create people with superhuman abilities, which have become the most effective weapon in the fight against the aliens. All the scientific strength of this project is based on the planet bastion (UNSC) Reach. But covenants are destroying the planet Reach and with the Spartans. Managed to escape just one ship - Â«Pillar Of AutumnÂ», in this ship was the last surviving Spartan - Master Chief (John-117), he is in the chamber. The ship jumps blindly through hyperspace, and comes out next to a mysterious alien artifact, codenamed Halo ...

DESCRIPTION:

Halo 2 - the long awaited continuation of the notorious shooter from Bungie Studios Halo, who created a boom in sales of Xbox.

plot of Halo 2 is a continuation of the first part. The protagonist, still a soldier of the future - the Master Chief. It is meant to cleanse the Earth from hostile alien invaders.

In the sequel, the developers more seriously and carefully approached the creation of a spatial environment. It will be much more diverse and also be fully interactive. Columns, lights, walls, doors, windows, in general, everything that can be destroyed in the real world - you can now destroy and virtual. Has undergone great changes and technology, of which it became twice. If earlier it was almost impregnable, it is now possible not only to break the car tires or shoot off the wings of the aircraft, but also kill the driver bit, so the vehicle itself. What about shooting from two hands, releasing the full clip at an enemy for a few seconds?
